p: Both the Si@PAA- g-PEG and Si@PAA electrodes, on the other hand, not only experienced severe cracking after 50 cycles, but also displayed non-uniform morphologies (Fig. 7b,c). This phenomenon is more apparent in their magnified images. The Si@PAU- g-PEG electrode maintained a uniform SEI layer, whereas the Si@PAA- g-PEG and Si@PAA electrodes formed thick, non-uniform SEI layers (Fig. 7a′–c′).
